name: Nemona Simulator 2023
description:
What is Nemona Simulator?

It's something between a meme game, fanfiction, and a bit of a comedy horror visual novel about a pushy companion

It really is a joke game, but now that joke is fleshed out!

-This is a visual novel with light rpg elements and 5 Endings!
-Created in RPG Maker MV
-Secrets to find??
-A fan-game unaffiliated with Nintendo/Creatures Inc.

We hope you enjoy and please share any feedback!

This game will always be free!
But check out our patreon if you're interested!

https://www.patreon.com/NykTV

Thanks! - nykTV
